attributes.action: Protect our children by making the MMR jab compulsory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the scare a few years back some parents no longer have their children vaccinated, putting all of our children at risk. The government needs to step in to ensure that all of our children are not put at risk by those people who are unaware or unwilling to accept the fact that the link to autism has been disproved.
